name: N64 test project
description:
This is a N64  test project mainly to learn developing on the playform.

Started at Retro Game Jam.

The game premise was to play as a Capybara papa who tries to get his memory back.

Might become a playable game who knows.

Gredit:

Thanks to Philip for actually making something that works in emulator :D

Joni and Ale trying to compile a n64 game with modernsdk.

Note that we used ARES emulation. There is no guarantee this works on PAL n64 yet.

This is no way a working project and might be updated in the future as we learn more about C and developing on N64.
